title: Artificer Spell List
excerpt: The spells available to the Artificer class.
markdown: # Artificer Spell List This section presents the Artificer spell list. The spells are organized by spell level and then alphabetized. ### Cantrips (Level 0) | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Acid Splash | Evocation | - | | Booming Blade | Evocation | - | | Create Bonfire | Conjuration | C | | Dancing Lights | Evocation | C | | Fire Bolt | Evocation | - | | Frostbite | Evocation | - | | Guidance | Divination | C | | Light | Evocation | - | | Lightning Lure | Evocation | - | | Mage Hand | Conjuration | - | | Magic Stone | Transmutation | - | | Mending | Transmutation | - | | Message | Transmutation | - | | Poison Spray | Necromancy | - | | Prestidigitation | Transmutation | - | | Ray of Frost | Evocation | - | | Resistance | Abjuration | C | | Shocking Grasp | Evocation | - | | Spare the Dying | Necromancy | - | | Sword Burst | Conjuration | - | | Thorn Whip | Transmutation | - | | Thunderclap | Evocation | - | ### 1st-Level Spells | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Absorb Elements | Abjuration | - | | Alarm | Abjuration | R | | Catapult | Transmutation | - | | Cure Wounds | Abjuration | - | | Detect Magic | Divination | C, R | | Disguise Self | Illusion | - | | Expeditious Retreat | Transmutation | C | | Faerie Fire | Evocation | C | | False Life | Necromancy | - | | Feather Fall | Transmutation | - | | Grease | Conjuration | - | | Identify | Divination | R, M | | Jump | Transmutation | - | | Longstrider | Transmutation | - | | Purify Food and Drink | Transmutation | R | | Sanctuary | Abjuration | - | | Snare | Abjuration | M | | Tasha's Caustic Brew | Evocation | C | ### 2nd-Level Spells | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Pyrotechnics | Transmutation | - | | Skywrite | Transmutation | C, R | ### 3rd-Level Spells | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Elemental Weapon | Transmutation | C | | Flame Arrows | Transmutation | C | | Fly | Transmutation | C | | Haste | Transmutation | C | | Revivify | Necromancy | M | | Tiny Servant | Transmutation | - | | Water Breathing | Transmutation | R | | Water Walk | Transmutation | R | ### 4th-Level Spells | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Arcane Eye | Divination | C | | Fabricate | Transmutation | - | | Freedom of Movement | Abjuration | - | | Leomund's Secret Chest | Conjuration | M | | Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum | Abjuration | - | | Otiluke's Resilient Sphere | Abjuration | C | | Stone Shape | Transmutation | - | | Stoneskin | Transmutation | C, M | ### 5th-Level Spells | Spell | School | Special | |---|---|---| | Skill Empowerment | Transmutation | C | | Transmute Rock | Transmutation | - | | Wall of Stone | Evocation | C |
